name: leojs
displayName: Leo Editor for Visual Studio Code
description: Leo, the literate editor with outline extension for Visual Studio Code.

leojs.checkForChangeExternalFiles.description: Set default for checking changes to external files

leojs.defaultReloadIgnore.description: Set default for derived files to always reload, or always ignore, when changes are detected

leojs.leoTreeBrowse.description: Specifies whether to use Leo's style of tree browsing with the arrow keys

leojs.treeKeepFocus.description: Specifies whether to keep focus in the outline when selecting a node - overridden by "leoTreeBrowse"

leojs.treeKeepFocusWhenAside.description: Specifies whether to keep focus in the outline when opening a body pane on the side

leojs.statusBarString.description: Sets the message string of the Status Bar Indicator

leojs.statusBarColor.description: Specifies the hexadecimal color string for the Status Bar Indicator

leojs.treeInExplorer.description: Show the outline tree in the explorer view

leojs.showOpenAside.description: Offer 'Open to the Side' in nodes context menu

leojs.showEditOnNodes.description: Shows 'Edit Headline' button on tree nodes

leojs.showArrowsOnNodes.description: Shows 'Move Node' arrow buttons on tree nodes

leojs.invertNodeContrast.description: Inverts the contrast of the dirty/clean border aspect of tree nodes

leojs.showEditionOnBody.description: Shows clone, delete and insert nodes above the body pane

leojs.showClipboardOnBody.description: Shows cut, copy & paste nodes above the body pane

leojs.showPromoteOnBody.description: Shows promote and demote above the body pane

leojs.showExecuteOnBody.description: Shows 'Execute Script' above the body pane

leojs.showExtractOnBody.description: Shows extract commands above the body pane

leojs.showImportOnBody.description: Shows 'Import File' above the body pane

leojs.showRefreshOnBody.description: Shows 'Refresh from disk' above the body pane

leojs.showHoistOnBody.description: Shows Hoist commands above the body pane

leojs.showMarkOnBody.description: Shows Mark commands above the body pane

leojs.showSortOnBody.description: Shows 'Sort Siblings' above the body pane

leojs.leoID.description: Used to uniquely identify nodes - Defaults to the OS/Environment user name
leojs.leoID.patternErrorMessage: Your id should contain only letters and numbers, and must contain at least 3 characters.

viewsWelcome.contents:
Open a remote repository first to enable LeoJS
[Open Remote Repository](command:remoteHub.openRepository)
See [Opening a project](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/vscode-web#_opening-a-project) for more info.

[Open Remote Repository](command:remoteHub.openRepository)
See [Opening a project](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/vscode-web#_opening-a-project) for more info.

commands.title: cfam - Clone Find All Marked Nodes

keybindings.when: leojsTreeOpened && editorTextFocus && resourceScheme == leojs || leojsTreeOpened && sideBarFocus && focusedView =~ /^leojsOutline/
leojsTreeOpened && sideBarFocus && focusedView =~ /^leojsOutline/ || leojsTreeOpened && editorTextFocus && editorHasSelection && resourceScheme == leojs
leojsTreeOpened && sideBarFocus && focusedView =~ /^leojsOutline/ || leojsTreeOpened && editorTextFocus && editorHasSelection && resourceScheme == leojs
leojsTreeOpened && sideBarFocus && focusedView =~ /^leojsOutline/ || leojsTreeOpened && editorTextFocus && resourceScheme == leojs
leojsTreeOpened && editorTextFocus && resourceScheme == leojs || leojsTreeOpened && sideBarFocus && focusedView =~ /^leojsOutline|^leojsDocuments|^leojsUndos/
leojsTreeOpened && editorTextFocus && resourceScheme == leojs || leojsTreeOpened && sideBarFocus && focusedView =~ /^leojsOutline|^leojsDocuments|^leojsUndos/

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
